thread.title: There Goes the Baker With His Tray of Beauty and the Beast Cookies, Like Always
thread.title_full: There Goes the Baker With His Tray of Beauty and the Beast Cookies, Like Always

author: Sarah Siegel
title: There Goes the Baker With His Tray of Beauty and the Beast Cookies, Like Always
text:
Beauty and the Beast Cookies There Goes the Baker With His Tray of Beauty and the Beast Cookies, Like Always March 2, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 There Goes the Baker With His Tray of Beauty and the Beast Cookies, Like Always 
Like the rest of the world, we are freaking out about the upcoming live-action Beauty and the Beast movie . We have our pantries stocked with Beast-adorned tea , we've scored our own enchanted rose tumblers , and we're cooking with a gorgeous Belle-inspired soup pot . If you're having a viewing party of the original animated movie ahead of seeing the live-action version, we have the perfect snacks for you: Beauty and the Beast cookies . 
These masterfully decorated cookies from TaleCookies on Etsy include all of your favorite characters from the classic and are sure to delight every Disney fan in your life. The best part is that you can order the cookies for yourself with a choice of three flavors: shortbread, chocolate chip, and gingerbread. While these homemade cookies aren't exactly cheap (six cookies cost $44, and 12 cost $84), they're definitely a worthwhile investment for any diehard Beauty and the Beast fan. 
Ahead, see the gorgeously decorated treats.
